item.title: Swift 6.2 Released
item.description: We are pleased to announce Swift 6.2.
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce Swift 6.2, the latest release of the Swift programming language.

This release includes improvements to concurrency, macros, and the package ecosystem.

item.title: Introducing Swift Testing
item.description: Swift Testing is a new framework for writing tests in Swift.
item.content:encoded: Swift Testing is a new, modern framework for writing tests in Swift, using macros and Swift concurrency.
